paper_abstract: We provide a conceptually simple and elementary proof of the exponential succinctness gal) between the two branching time temporal logics CTL+ and CTL. It only uses CTL's small model property instead of automata- or game-theory and combinatorics as in previous proofs by Wilke and Adler/Immerman. (c) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A purely model-theoretic proof of the exponential succinctness gap between CTL+ and CTL
